title: Loving Yourself
description: When you adore yourself, you watch out for yourself inwardly, physically, rationally, and profoundly. Obviously, these parts of you are associated. Along these lines, despite the fact that they can be tended to independently, you.You'll see that you feel most adored when you take care of every one of them. In this book, you'll discover proposals for how to think about yourself in each of the four of these aspects of your physical, intellectual, emotional, spiritual and profound.
author: Cice Rivera
